answers.answer: Bump..please if anyone has had a close call like this id really appreciate your help
I don't understand why you had to take the 3 hour when you passed the 1 hour test?I'm sure you'll be fine though. If you're really worried, watch your diet.
I did with my son, and i didnt get it at the end of my pregnancy, with my daughter i passed with flying colors

Ya know, you passed.  If they feared you were going to get gestational diabetes, they'd warn you of such.  I wouldn't focus on being close to not passing.  Try not to worry.  If it makes you feel better, watch your sugar.  But you should be fine.  good luck dear

I barely passed. It wasnt by one point. Honestly I dont remember the numbers. But my mom had gestational, my grandma had it, my aunts had it, I mean it ran in my family. But I just watched my diet and exercised this whole pregnancy and I never got it. Im almost 38 weeks :). So just watch your sugar intake and exercise and you should be just fine! :)

question: I passed my first 1hr glucose test, and I just found out I passed my 3hr glucose test but ONLY by 1point..I feel so depressed about that, I feel like im going to get Gestational diabetes by the end of my pregnancy..has anyone else passed by just 1point and been just fine and still never developed it??
title: my 3hour glucose
